name: Sweet Flowers and Salt
description:
This project is created as a personal experiment to explore the rpg maker MV engine and prepare for future projects. There's no sensical plot to this game. I stg there's no silly twist in this game either. 

WARNING: MAY BE BUGGY AS I HAD NO PLAYTESTERS SINCE THIS IS JUST AN EXPERIMENT. THE WEB VERSION IS EXTREMELY BUGGY, SO IT IS RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION.

- Gameplay duration: Half hour - A few hours

- 4 endings

- Hold [z]/[space]/[Enter] key to fast forward gameplay and cutscenes.

- plan to update for future experimenting...

- Will plan to upload a Mac OS X and Linux version in the future...

A cute healing type of game that's as sweet as Salt herself.

"Let's grow flowers with Salt!"

"Harvest and collect in your collection box to level up!"

"Reach the 99th level and your wish for happiness will be granted."
